name: smarthomefacts
0:
”Alexa, open smart home facts”
”Alexa ask smart home facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart home facts
des:
Ask for smart home facts, and learn about how people are adopting smart home technologies.
To start, just say "Alexa, launch smart home facts" or "Alexa, open smart home facts" to get a fact".
At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
